creditline: Gift of Patricia Dahlman and Michael Dal Cerro in memory of Babs and Don Dahlman
description: abstract image; washy black lines that form an irregular pattern, with black section in CR; washy blue lines in ULQ and at L edge of image; pale blue-gray shading in crayon; notebook holes on L edge of sheet; spots of orange pigment in CL of image
inscription: LRC, in gray pigment: 1962 - DAYTON - OHIO
markings: Paper labels attached with pencil inscriptions, verso
medium: Black ink, black chalk, and watercolor on paper
signed: LRC, in gray pigment: GEORGE MORRISON
title: Untitled (Dayton, Ohio)
